page.title: 08RECREATION,CAREW AREA,TENBY.
page.content: A greater variety of leisure_time pursuits are available in 1985,many the result of new technology. Activities can be split into 2 catergories_ those that are individual pursuits and,secondly,those pursued as a family or group unit. The results of our survey indicate that{gardening is the most popular {individual pursuit.}Most people watch {T.V.,}many have{videos}too. Some favour{do_it_yourself.}Others like working on{computers,}playing{video {games,watching or playing sport}and {reading. Families go out more now than years ago.Some like to visit the{cinema}or {swimming pool.}Many adults enjoy going to a{pub}or{restaurant.}Others enjoy playing{bingo.}Some people join{clubs such as{bowling}or{squash}clubs.
